org.apache.taverna.server.master.worker

Interface PolicyLimits

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    WorkerModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalWorkerState

    public interface PolicyLimits
    The worker policy delegates certain limits to the state model of the particular worker.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getMaxRuns() 
      int getOperatingLimit() 
      List<URI> getPermittedWorkflowURIs() 
      void setPermittedWorkflowURIs(List<URI> permitted) 

    • Method Detail

      • getMaxRuns

        int getMaxRuns()
        Returns:
        the maximum number of extant workflow runs in any state

      • getOperatingLimit

        int getOperatingLimit()
        Returns:
        the maximum number of workflow runs in the operating state.

      • getPermittedWorkflowURIs

        List<URI> getPermittedWorkflowURIs()
        Returns:
        the list of URIs to workflows that may be used to create workflow runs. If empty or null, no restriction is present.

      • setPermittedWorkflowURIs

        void setPermittedWorkflowURIs(List<URI> permitted)
        Parameters:
        permitted - the list of URIs to workflows that may be used to create workflow runs.
